extends org.java.plugin.standard.StandardPluginLifecycleHandler
    LifecycleHandler that creates PavePluginClassLoaders.
    Version:
    $Revision$ $Date$ Jo Ellen Brandmeyer, Ph.D., UNC, CEMPD 3/2014: corrected error that msgCenter.debug required 2 arguments, per Eclipse's suggestion added a 2nd argument as "null"
    Author:
    Nick Collier
